page.title: 20DOMESDAY SURVEY OF N.BRISTOL
page.content:
{Contributors: Doncaster Road Junior School. Dunmail Primary School. Embleton Junior School. Henbury Court Infant School. Westbury-on-Trym C.E. School.
Great idea! What a pity there was so little time to organize & then complete this survey.Consequently most of the research & recording of information has been carried out by the teachers from the participating schools more than children. The area showed such great diversity that it was often difficult to maintain a common identity;it was really two areas in one. The brevity required on each page made it impossible to do justice to each topic.
